product_name: Rossignol Fun Girl Skis with Bindings - Junior Girls' - 2013/2014
long_description: Novice to intermediate girls looking to rip it up all over the mountain will find a new best friend in Rossignol Fun Girl skis with bindings. They're suited to skiers weighing more than 45 lbs.. Designed to be stable and forgiving, Rossignol Fun Girl skis with bindings encourage confidence and skill progression; ideal for groomed trails at low to medium speeds. Cap construction keeps skis light and fun. Forgiving microcell-foam core won't punish a developing skier for small mistakes yet is responsive enough to encourage skill progression. Saphir 45 bindings feature lightweight composite materials that ease turn transitions and make carrying skis a breeze. Design makes it easy to step into and exit the bindings. Catering to lightweight skiers, DIN range of 0.75 - 4.5 allows bindings to release boots easily in the event of a tumble. Recommended skier weight ranges from 45 to 79 lbs. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Novice to intermediate girls looking to rip it up all over the mountain will find a new best friend in Rossignol Fun Girl skis with bindings. They're suited to skiers weighing more than 45 lbs..
